PartsProDate = #{partsprodate,jdbcType=DATE},

update biz_parts set PartsName = #{partsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PartsModel = #{partsmodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PartsLoc = #{partsloc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PartsProDate = #{partsprodate,jdbcType=DATE}, PartsRemark = #{partsremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PartsId = #{partsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select PartsId, PartsName, PartsLoc, PartsProDate, PartsRemark from biz_parts
PartsName like concat('%',#{PartsName},'%')
